schema.description: The dependencies of all nodes in the workflow. preTaskCode specifies the ID of an upstream node, and postTaskCode specifies the ID of a downstream node. The ID of each node is unique. If a node does not have an upstream node, set preTaskCode to 0.

items.description: The dependency of the node in the workflow. preTaskCode specifies the ID of an upstream node, and postTaskCode specifies the ID of a downstream node. The ID of the node is unique. If a node does not have an upstream node, set preTaskCode to 0.

name.description: The name of the node topology. You can enter a workflow name.

preTaskCode.description: The ID of the upstream node.

preTaskVersion.description: The version of the upstream node.

postTaskCode.description: The ID of the downstream node.

postTaskVersion.description: The version of the downstream node.

startTime.description: The start time of the scheduling.

endTime.description: The end time of the scheduling.

crontab.description: The CRON expression that is used for scheduling.

timezoneId.description: The ID of the time zone.
